t: Recoop Barrels – ProBrewer
s: We do not sell new barrels. ReCoop Barrels, a Sonoma County-based company, specializes in reconditioning wine barrels, offering a more cost-effective and environmentally sustainable alternative to the traditional practice of retiring and replacing barrels with new oak.

t: Recoop Barrels | Sonoma County | The Beverage People
s: Reconditioned barrels are a more economically and environmentally sustainable practice than using new oak barrels. With Recoop Barrels, youre doubling the life of the barrel. New wine barrels for sale often cost $1,000 or more. Save big AND make world class wine.
